message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.
My turn. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.  This is a generous offer considering the inflation working against you, Alice.
Okay, I'll go down to 60% but I'm not budging any further.  You're taking advantage of the inflation, but I'm not going to let you take everything!
I'm proposing a 65/35 split.  The clock is ticking, Alice, and every round makes this deal worse for you. Let's be reasonable and close this out.
Fine, we'll split it 50/50. This is the best I can do, and I'm not going any lower. Let's just end this already.
